sentences.en: A circle is an ellipse with zero eccentricity.
sentences.cn: 圆形是零离线率的椭圆.

sentences.en: Abstract For multi - ellipse detection , this paper proposed a randomized fast detection approach.
sentences.cn: 摘要针对多椭圆检测问题提出了一种快速随机检测算法.

sentences.en: Construct hyperbola and the ellipse by taking the inversion.
sentences.cn: [利用反逆法作双曲线及椭圆].

sentences.en: Face moment computation for ellipse fitting complete source code, has been tested.
sentences.cn: 面对时刻计算椭圆拟合完整的源代码, 已经过测试.

sentences.en: Of , relating to, or having the shape of an ellipse.
sentences.cn: 叶子的形状;椭圆的形状.

sentences.en: Send the ellipse behind all the artwork and set it to Multiply.
sentences.cn: 发送椭圆背后的所有作品,并将其设置为倍增.

sentences.en: Shows how to draw a filled ellipse.
sentences.cn: 演示如何绘制实心椭圆.

sentences.en: Square, rectangle, circular, ellipse and flake etc.
sentences.cn: 包装物形方形 、 长方形 、 圆形 、 椭圆形、片状等.

sentences.en: Squish the ellipse to about half the size.
The Earth orbits in an ellipse.
The following illustration shows an ellipse filled with a horizontal hatch pattern.
sentences.cn: 下面的插图显示用水平交错线模式填充的椭圆.

sentences.en: The Golden Ellipse In Rose Gold Showcases A Totally New Color Harmony.
sentences.cn: 金黄色的椭圆手表与玫瑰色金制陈列橱相互辉映,融为一体.

sentences.en: The mesh shapes include circularity, sexangle, ellipse, square, prism and so on.
sentences.cn: 圆形 、 六角形 、 椭圆形 、 正方形 、 棱形等.

sentences.en: The moon doesn't describe a circle round the earth, but rather an ellipse.
sentences.cn: 月球绕地球运行的轨道不是浑圆的, 而是椭圆的.

sentences.en: This aggregate manipulation is represented by an point and ellipse.
sentences.cn: 此聚合操作由原点和椭圆表示.

trans.tran_en: a curved shape like a circle, but with two slightly longer and flatter sides
